name: The Final Game Poster
description:
This is CMPM120/ ARTG120 Final Project. 

Remember! After the dialog is over, press "S" to begin the game. The game is not bugged!!! Thank you! The Game Creator: 

Amanda Bahadori,Yunhan Wei,Wichapas Pichetpongsa,ZhiBin Huang.

Introduction about our Game:

Our game is super easy, and our goals is that we want the player to learn how to cook. In some way, we try to encourage players to experience cooking skills, but in a fun and somewhat challenging way. 

Game Rule:
  1. The Player will control a cute, lovely character called Jim Whitehead using the arrow keys.
  2. Players need to collect ingredients around the kitchen. Stand in front of the fridge and press SPACEBAR to obtain them.
  3.  Once you have all the ingredients as listed in the recipe, press SPACEBAR to start pouring the ingredients using your mouse to drag and drop. Once you're done, you have to now stir using left, up, right, down keys. Then, to bake you need to control the temperature so press SPACEBAR when the timing is right!
  4. Now that is a fine cake! Good, but it is not finished yet because you will need to decorate the cake after that. You will get a rating for what you made to master the skills of Bake.
  5. Once the order is done, the players will receive grade for the orders. how fast you can make is the highest-level grade you will receive, and continuous on the next customers. Are you ready for this? Enjoy and have Fun!
What do I do? How do I feel?

Our player experience goals and make players feel to learn how to cook. Again, we hope we game bring the cute pixel art with colorful backgrounds to create an atmosphere that is welcoming for the player. We hope Our game can encourage the player to first experience the cooking skills.

Remember! After the dialog is over, press "S" to begin the game. The game is not bugged!!!
